questions.question: Which of the following best describes the tape of a Turing machine?

answers.b: An infinite sequence of cells with symbols
answers.c: A sequence of cells with only a fixed number of symbols
answers.d: A tape that can't be written on

questions.question: If a non-deterministic Turing machine (NDTM) has multiple possible transitions from a given state for a specific input, it:

answers.a: Must choose the transition leading to a halt state
answers.b: Requires human intervention to choose the right transition
answers.c: Can proceed with all of them simultaneously

questions.question: Which of the following statements is true about the languages accepted by deterministic Turing machines?

answers.a: They can only accept regular languages
answers.b: They can accept any language, including non-computable ones
answers.c: They can accept any language that is Turing-decidable
answers.d: They can only accept context-free languages
